incentives.name: Florida Solar Property Tax Exemption
incentives.description: 100% of solar system value is exempt from property tax assessment. Saves average of $5,500+ over system lifetime.

incentives.name: Florida Sales Tax Exemption for Solar
incentives.description: All solar PV equipment, including panels, inverters, batteries, EV chargers, racking, and installation costs are exempt from sales tax. Average savings ~$2,097.
incentives.value: 6% sales tax exemption on all solar equipment and installation

incentives.name: Florida Net Metering
incentives.description: Required for FPL, Duke Energy, FPU, and TECO. Full retail rate credit. Monthly rollover, annual true-up at 3-5 cents/kWh.
incentives.value: Full retail rate, annual excess at ~3-5 cents/kWh

incentives.name: Florida PACE Financing
incentives.description: PACE financing available statewide for solar and energy improvements
